categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Orion of Dwaincast was a young noble from the Gasharn Kingdom who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

During the Battle of Hoth, Dwaincast was killed when an AT-AT shot the command center. Before dying, he just had the time to entrust his seal ring and his daggerto some fellow rebels he saved days before.
Two days after the battle, an Emperor's Hand, Mara Jade, found his corpse, but wasn't able to retrieve the ring and the dagger for her master.
Orion de Dwaincast was created for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "Trahison héroïque" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 86.
